traits.label: color
traits.name: :color
traits.desc: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette

traits.label: text-color
traits.name: :text-color
traits.desc: Overrides text color (if needed); Color name from the Quasar Color Palette

traits.label: floating
traits.name: :floating
traits.desc: Tell QBadge if it should float to the top right side of the relative positioned parent element or not

traits.label: transparent
traits.name: :transparent
traits.desc: Applies a 0.8 opacity; Useful especially for floating QBadge

traits.label: multi-line
traits.name: :multi-line
traits.desc: Content can wrap to multiple lines

traits.label: label
traits.name: :label
traits.desc: Badge's content as string; overrides default slot if specified

traits.label: outline
traits.name: :outline
traits.desc: Use 'outline' design (colored text and borders only)
